blessings.description: Rise to the top. The worst pitcher on your Team pays out 5x more for Snacks.
blessings.subheader: Brought to you by @Yes Plz Coffee@
blessings.title: Rise and Grind

blessings.description: Look at me. Most Idolized player on your team gives double-payouts as an Idol.
blessings.title: Center of Attention

blessings.description: Boosts a random player on your Team by 1% anytime you activate Sun 2.
blessings.title: Sun Dialed

blessings.description: The Black Hole will impair a random player on the other team by 1% anytime your Team activates it.
blessings.title: Unholey

blessings.description: Your Team plays 25% better when Runners are On Base in Flooding Weather.
blessings.title: High Pressure

blessings.description: One Player on your Team becomes Chunky, one becomes Smooth.
blessings.title: Peanut Butter

blessings.description: Two Random players in your Team's lineup get Flippers.
blessings.title: Spare Flippers

blessings.description: Hatch a rookie from the Field of Eggs to join your Rotation.
blessings.title: Stow Away

blessings.description: Your entire Division's pitching is boosted by 4%.
blessings.title: Pitching Flotation Bubble

blessings.description: Your entire Division's hitting is boosted by 4%.
blessings.title: Hitting Flotation Bubble

blessings.description: Your entire Division's defense is boosted by 4%.
blessings.title: Defense Flotation Bubble

blessings.description: Your entire Division's baserunning is boosted by 4%.
blessings.title: Baserunning Flotation Bubble

decrees.description: Allows Division Winners to Hatch a Player from the Field of Eggs with a chosen name from the Filtered Pool.
decrees.title: Bird Rights

decrees.description: A Player on each Team is placed in the Force Field, protecting them from Steals and Swaps. Use a Will to move the Field to another Player.
decrees.title: Force Fields

decrees.description: Teams that finish in the Bottom 4 of the League will receive an extra Will in that Season's Election.
decrees.title: Free Wills

wills.description: Steal a Player from the Idols board. Send a random Player from your Team back.

info.description: Which Idol do you want to steal?

wills.title: Plunder

wills.description: Swap a Player from a Team in the opposite Subleague with a Player from your Team.

info.description: Which team do you want to swap with?
What player do you want to swap for?
What player do you want to send back?

wills.title: Exchange

wills.description: Swap a Player from your Shadows to your active roster.

info.description: What player from the Shadows do you want to call up to the active roster?
What player from your active roster do you want to send to the Shadows?

wills.title: Foreshadow

wills.description: Boost a Player on your Team by 15% to 30%.

info.description: Which player do you want to Boost?

wills.title: Infuse

wills.description: Receive a mystery Benefit for one of your Teams' Players.

info.description: Which player do you want to receive the Benefit?

wills.title: Trust

wills.description: Call in an Alternate for a Player on your Team.

info.description: Which player do you want to call an Alternate for?

wills.title: Alternate

wills.description: Revoke a Player from your roster.

info.description: Which player do you want to revoke?

wills.title: Revoke

wills.description: Pick a modification for your Team next season.
wills.title: Enrich
